plot: Michael is out for revenge after the murder of his wife. It's up to Chris, the hostage negotiator assigned to the case, to keep Michael from pulling the trigger.
title: Yellow Tulips
plot_es: Michael is out for revenge after the murder of his wife. It's up to Chris, the hostage negotiator assigned to the case, to keep Michael from pulling the trigger.
plot_en: Michael is out for revenge after the murder of his wife. It's up to Chris, the hostage negotiator assigned to the case, to keep Michael from pulling the trigger.
